channel.title: R on Chris Turner
channel.description: Recent content in R on Chris Turner

item.title: R and Python
item.description: R library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.4 ✓ dplyr 1.0.2 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggplot2) ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + geom_point() library(reticulate) hi<-"Hello" cat(c(hi,py$hi)) ## Hello Including Plots You can also embed plots.
